document_data.mainbody:
Key to Phantoms Cloister is an adventure module by Ving Domanski set in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting using the 3.5-edition Dungeons & Dragons rules and designed for the RPGAs Legacy of the Green Regent campaign. It was released in 2003 and has interior art by David Esbr√≠ and maps by Dorwin Cooper. Intended for four or five 1-level characters, it has the player-characters investigate a ghost sighting.
The annual haunting of a ghost in the streets of Loudwater is interrupted by a groundling attack. Their burrowing reveals a previously undiscovered reliquary containing a tangible shard of pure light. Following clues, the party makes their way to the ruin of Phantoms Cloister, where they find Zhentarim battling creatures under the control of a vicious quasit.
